TEXT.TITLE: FHLBB CHANGES SHORT-TERM DISCOUNT NOTE RATES
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Home Loan Bank Board adjusted the rates on its short-term discount notes as follows: MATURITY NEW RATE OLD RATE MATURITY 30-176 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 30-176 days 177-195 days 5.85 pct 5.83 pct 177-195 days 196-271 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 196-271 days 272-295 days 5.93 pct 5.91 pct 272-295 days 296-341 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 296-341 days 342-346 days 5.90 pct 5.90 pct 342-346 days 347-360 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 347-360 days Reuter
